dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.cz: Ahoj! Vypadáš, že něco hledáš. Potřebuješ pomoct?
dialogue.en: Hi! You look like you're looking for something. Do you need help?

dialogue.speaker: Uživatel
dialogue.cz: Pozdrav a řekni, že hledáš autobusovou zastávku.
en: Hello! Yes, I'm looking for the bus stop.
Hi! Do you know where the bus stop is?
Hello, I need to find a bus stop.
Hi! I'm trying to get to a bus stop.
Hey, do you know where I can catch the bus?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.cz: Jasně, rád pomůžu. Kam přesně chceš jet?
dialogue.en: Sure, I’ll be happy to help. Where exactly do you want to go?

dialogue.speaker: Uživatel
dialogue.cz: Řekni, že jedeš do centra města.
en: I’m going to the city centre.
I need to get to the city center.
To the city centre, please.
I'm heading to the city center.
I want to go to downtown.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.cz: Rozumím. Do centra jede autobus číslo 24. Zastávka je hned za rohem vedle kavárny.
dialogue.en: Got it. Bus number 24 goes to the city centre. The stop is just around the corner next to the café.

dialogue.speaker: Uživatel
dialogue.cz: Zeptej se, kdy jede další autobus.
en: When is the next bus?
What time does the next bus arrive?
Do you know when the next bus comes?
How long until the next bus?
When does the next bus leave?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.cz: Další autobus přijede za deset minut. Mívá ale někdy zpoždění, tak doporučuju být tam trochu dřív.
dialogue.en: The next bus will arrive in ten minutes. It’s sometimes a bit late, so I recommend getting there a little early.

dialogue.speaker: Uživatel
dialogue.cz: Poděkuj a zeptej se, kde si můžeš koupit jízdenku.
en: Thanks! Where can I buy a ticket?
Thank you. Where do I get a ticket?
Thanks a lot! Is there a place to buy a ticket nearby?
Thank you! How can I get a ticket?
Where do I purchase a bus ticket?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.cz: Jízdenku si můžeš koupit v automatu u zastávky nebo přes mobilní aplikaci. Obě možnosti jsou jednoduché.
dialogue.en: You can buy a ticket at the machine by the bus stop or via a mobile app. Both are easy to use.

dialogue.speaker: Uživatel
dialogue.cz: Zeptej se, kolik to stojí a jestli se dá platit kartou.
en: How much is it? Can I pay by card?
What’s the price of the ticket? Can I use a card?
How much does a ticket cost? And can I pay with a card?
Is it possible to pay with a card? And how much is the ticket?
Do you know how much it is and if card payments are accepted?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.cz: Jedna jízdenka stojí třicet korun. Platba kartou je možná jak v automatu, tak v aplikaci.
dialogue.en: One ticket costs thirty crowns. You can pay by card both at the machine and in the app.

dialogue.speaker: Uživatel
dialogue.cz: Zeptej se, jak dlouho platí jízdenka.
en: How long is the ticket valid for?
How long does the ticket last?
Is there a time limit on the ticket?
How long can I use the ticket?
What’s the ticket’s validity?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.cz: Platí 45 minut od označení. Můžeš s ní i přestupovat.
dialogue.en: It’s valid for 45 minutes after validation. You can use it to change buses too.

dialogue.speaker: Uživatel
en: Thank you so much! Have a nice day!
Thanks a lot. Goodbye!
Thank you, I appreciate your help. Bye!
Thanks, have a great day!
Thank you very much! See you!

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.cz: Není zač! Přeji ti hezký den a ať dobře dorazíš!
dialogue.en: You're welcome! Have a great day and safe travels!
